node.title: Man who allegedly strangled former partner and took their child faces court
node.alt: Woman with long dark hair wearing a cap
node.description: Family members of a Logan mother left "fighting for her life" after her former partner allegedly strangled her and took off with their babyÂ say she and the boy "didn't deserve" what happened.
node.content:
["Family members of a Logan mother left \"fighting for her life\" after her former partner allegedly strangled her and took off with their baby\u00a0have said she and the boy \"didn't deserve\" what happened.", "Reo Te Whetu Marama Marsh faced the Richlands Magistrates Court this morning charged with grievous bodily harm and strangulation.", "The 34-year-old was arrested in Oxley early on Sunday morning, several hours after police were called to a disturbance at a Gold Coast apartment complex.", "Police allege he attacked Mary Benedito inside the Southport unit on Saturday afternoon, before leaving with their 11-month-old son.", "", "
CCTV footage of Reo Te Whetu Marama Marsh\u00a0carrying the couple's child.(Supplied: Queensland Police)
", "Emergency crews found the 25-year-old woman unresponsive and she was taken to the Gold Coast University Hospital with life-threatening injuries.", "She remains in hospital in a serious condition.", "After police issued an amber alert for the pair, two women who were known to the man\u00a0took the child to the Crestmead Police Station.", "In a brief appearance in court on Monday, Mr Marsh's lawyer did not make an application for bail on his behalf and the matter was adjourned.", "The case is due to be heard again next year in Southport.", "Outside court, the woman's cousin, Suli Patterson, said Ms Benedito was still \"fighting for her life\" in hospital.", "\"It is a pretty sad incident \u2014 no-one deserved any of this,\" he said.", "\"Her poor son is laying there waiting for his mum to come back; it's not fair.\"", "He said other family members were struggling to travel to Queensland to support Ms Benedito due to border restrictions.", "\"Everyone in New Zealand is trying to come over for her,\" he said."]
